vocabularies.meaning: Lasting for a very short time.
vocabularies.example: The beauty of the sunset was ephemeral, fading within minutes.

vocabularies.meaning: The occurrence of events by chance in a happy or beneficial way.
vocabularies.example: It was pure serendipity that they met at the café after years of losing touch.

vocabularies.meaning: Showing great attention to detail; very careful and precise.
vocabularies.example: The artist was meticulous in painting every tiny leaf on the tree.

vocabularies.meaning: Representing the most perfect or typical example of a quality or class.
vocabularies.example: The little café was the quintessential Parisian experience, complete with croissants and cobblestone streets.

vocabularies.meaning: Showing a selfless concern for the well-being of others.
vocabularies.example: Her altruistic nature led her to volunteer at the shelter every weekend.
